channel.title: Quinn on K.Q. Dreger
channel.description: Recent content in Quinn on K.Q. Dreger

item.title: Contentedness
item.description: Leaning against our headboard awake far later than I wish to be, my little guy nuzzles deeper into the crook of my arm he’s chosen to fall asleep in and I can’t help but feel it’s all so very much worth it; the fatigue, frustration, fear—they all melt away in these moments, and for a minute my heart knows nothing but the contentedness of a man who truly has everything, and for whom nothing else could replace this feeling.
